data.caption: Clarification - Financial Results
data.news_body: The Exchange has sought clarification from Agro Phos India Limited for the quarter ended 30-Sep-2025 with respect to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015. On basis of above the Company is required to clarify the following:  The response of the Company is awaited.

data.caption: Outcome of Board Meeting
data.news_body: Agro Phos India Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Outcome of Board Meeting held on December 31, 2025.

data.news_body: Agro Phos India Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Outcome of Board Meeting held on December 31, 2025.

data.caption: General Updates
data.news_body: Agro Phos India Limited has informed the Exchange about General Updates regarding the Company has sold/disposed off the shareholdings in Shri Tulsi Phosphate Limited. Post dilution, the shareholding in Shri Tulsi Phosphate Limited has come down from 27.49 % to 19.51%.

data.caption: Appointment
data.news_body: Agro Phos India Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Appointment of Mr Samir Kumar Biswas as Non- Executive Independent Director  of the company w.e.f. December 31, 2025.

data.caption: Trading Window
data.news_body: Agro Phos India Limited has informed the Exchange regarding the Trading Window closure pursuant to SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015

data.caption: Updates
data.news_body: Agro Phos India Limited has informed the Exchange regarding 'To submit financial results for the period ended 30-Sep-2025 in Machine Readable Form / Legible copy as per NSE mail dated 10.12.2025'.
